channel.title: On the Forums
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "On the Forums"

item.title: Re: On the Forums
item.content:encoded:
We need more Season 2 contributors. It feels like there's a whole part of this game we're missing due to most of us being Season 1.

I'll include that info somewhere as soon as I can figure out where it'd be appropriate :)

item.title: Re: On the Forums
item.content:encoded:
Well I dunno, but I have a new one for ya ^^

if you are Season 2 you can lvl up Smokey the bearâ€¦

C-rank mission: Flatter an Ambassador

Smokey the bear lvl 2: +3 nin success (can drift race)

^.^

item.title: On the Forums
item.content:encoded:
I'm not too sure how much these forums are going to get used. They are kind of awkward compared to the forums that people usually use. Still, I'm not really aware of any pure BvS forums that exist on the Internet, so maybe they'll get used a lot.

At the very least, it'll be a place for us to discuss how to do things with the Wiki instead of me just changing things on my own with no feedback all the time.

I dunno. What do you guys think?
